Projects.name: MrDeconstruction
Projects.description: MrDeconstruction is a 2D platformer made in Java which I started building during the early months of 2018. The play-style is Super-Mario Bros-like, but with Minecraft mechanics as you 'construct' and 'destroy' the world to proceed in the game.

Projects.name: Graphical Calculator
Projects.description: Graphical Calculator is a small JavaFX-project which can plot arbitrary polynomials. The program supports multiple plots, custom grading of axis aswell as zooming to find any intersection between the functions.
